alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 12:52PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weld County through 130 PM MDT... At 1251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout tornado 8 miles southwest of Hereford, or 26 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Weld County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
